thread.title: Ryan Kesler’s small son scored a goal in the NHL All-Star skills competition shootout
thread.title_full: Ryan Kesler’s small son scored a goal in the NHL All-Star skills competition shootout

author: Mary Clarke
title: Ryan Kesler’s small son scored a goal in the NHL All-Star skills competition shootout
text:
WHAT A KID!
The MVP of the NHL All-Star skills competition is Ryker Kesler. Never heard of him? He’s the small son of Ryan Kesler, of the Anaheim Ducks.
The reason he’s the MVP? Baby Kesler scored a beauty of a goal in the final event of the All-Star skills competition, the shootout!
Seriously, look at this thing.
Ryan Kesler's son scores on Carey Price and high-fives the all-stars pic.twitter.com/dtnEwwPg8N 
— Brady Trettenero (@BradyTrett) January 29, 2017 GREAT GOAL BY KESLER! pic.twitter.com/QmqB4RMskx 
— Marc Dumont (@MarcPDumont) January 29, 2017 LOOK AT HIM GO. YOU’RE THE REAL MVP, RYKER!
